item.title: Curiosity Jar
item.description: Introduction This repository is a collection of data analysis projects focusing purely on expressing curiosity on a various topics ranging from science, maths, games, etc. It generally consists three main parts: Introduction where a concept and questions are introduced Experimental Procedures where a script is written to prove the concept Results where statistical and visual results are presented Inspiration As we have entered the information era, the Internet is full of endless information scattered all over the place.
